data.name: ExportTipDesc
data.value: The full JSON backup can be used to restore all data. CSV files are perfect for analysis in Excel or Google Sheets.

data.name: NoGoalsMessage
data.value: No goals yet. Create your first financial goal!

data.name: LoginSubtitle
data.value: Login to manage your family finances

data.name: SetupSubtitle
data.value: Set up FamilyFinance for your family

data.name: SetupInfo
data.value: You will be the family administrator and can invite other members. Data is saved locally on your computer.

data.name: ViewerRestriction
data.value: You don't have permission to modify data

data.name: ImportDataDesc
data.value: Restore data from a JSON backup

data.name: ReplaceExisting
data.value: Replace existing data (update with backup values)

data.name: BudgetManagementDesc
data.value: Configure expense categories and monthly limits

data.name: NoBudgetCategoriesDesc
data.value: Start by creating expense categories to track your monthly budget

data.name: MonthlyBudgetHint
data.value: Leave 0 if you don't want to set a limit

data.name: SetupBudgetCategories
data.value: Configure categories to track monthly expenses

data.name: NeedTwoSnapshots
data.value: You need at least two snapshots to compare.

data.name: NeedMoreSnapshotsDesc
data.value: Create at least 2 monthly snapshots to see projections

data.name: PrivacyIntro
data.value: FamilyFinance is an open-source application for family wealth management. This policy describes how your personal data is processed in accordance with the European Regulation 2016/679 (GDPR).

data.name: PrivacyFinancialData
data.value: Financial data entered by the user

data.name: PrivacyCookiesIntro
data.value: We only use essential technical cookies, necessary for the application to function. We do not use profiling, analytics, or advertising cookies.

data.name: PrivacyDataSharingText
data.value: Your data is not shared with third parties. We do not use analytics, advertising, or social tracking services. Data is stored exclusively on the application server.

data.name: PrivacySecurityHash
data.value: Passwords stored with secure hash (ASP.NET Core Identity)

data.name: PrivacyRightsIntro
data.value: As a data subject, you have the right to:

data.name: PrivacyRightAccess
data.value: Access - Obtain a copy of your data

data.name: PrivacyRightErase
data.value: Erasure - Request deletion of your data

data.name: PrivacyRightPortability
data.value: Portability - Export your data (built-in Export feature)

data.name: PrivacyRightsContact
data.value: To exercise these rights, contact me on

data.name: PrivacyDemoText
data.value: The demo account uses fictional data for demonstration purposes. Demo data may be reset periodically. Do not enter real personal data in the demo account.

data.name: PrivacyOpenSourceText
data.value: FamilyFinance is an open-source project. The source code is available on GitHub for transparency and verification.

data.name: DemoModeDescription
data.value: You are exploring with sample data. Data may be reset periodically.

data.name: DemoModeCredentials
data.value: Use demo credentials to explore the app:

data.name: GoalsDescription
data.value: Manage your financial goals and track progress

data.name: AccountsDescription
data.value: Manage your bank and financial accounts

data.name: CompareDescription
data.value: Compare two periods to analyze variations

data.name: ProjectionsDescription
data.value: Forecasts and projections based on your historical data

data.name: NoGoalsHint
data.value: Start by creating your first financial goal

data.name: DataManagementDesc
data.value: Import and export your financial data

data.name: CreateSnapshotToTrackInvestments
data.value: Create a snapshot to start tracking your investments

data.name: CreateInterestAccountDesc
data.value: Set up an interest account to track earnings

data.name: CreatePensionInsuranceDesc
data.value: Add a pension or insurance account to get started

data.name: PasswordRequirements
data.value: Minimum 8 characters, at least one letter and one number

data.name: ActivityLogRetentionDesc
data.value: Activity logs are retained for 90 days and then automatically deleted.

data.name: AdminOnlyPageDesc
data.value: This page is only accessible to Admin users. System logs contain technical information useful for debugging.

data.name: TourWelcomeDesc
data.value: This is your financial dashboard. From here you can monitor your entire family wealth.

data.name: TourTotalDesc
data.value: Here you see the updated total of your wealth, including liquidity, investments and credits.

data.name: TourChartDesc
data.value: This chart shows how your wealth has changed over time. Each point is a snapshot.

data.name: TourGoalsDesc
data.value: Set financial goals and track progress. You can set deadlines and target amounts.

data.name: TourSidebarDesc
data.value: Use the sidebar to access all sections: Snapshots, Accounts, Budget, Goals and more.

data.name: TourActionsDesc
data.value: Quickly create new snapshots, set goals or manage your accounts from here.

data.name: TourCompleteDesc
data.value: Now you know everything you need. If you need help, look for the (?) icons in various sections.

data.name: LandingHeroSubtitle
data.value: Monitor wealth, investments and goals in one intuitive dashboard

data.name: FeatureSnapshotsDesc
data.value: Capture the state of your finances at any time. Compare over time and analyze trends.

data.name: FeatureGoalsDesc
data.value: Set savings or investment goals. Track progress with visual indicators.

data.name: FeatureBudgetDesc
data.value: Categorize expenses and keep the family budget under control month by month.

data.name: FeatureChartsDesc
data.value: Visualize wealth trends with clear charts and future projections.

data.name: FeatureFamilyDesc
data.value: Share access with family members. Each family has its own isolated data.

data.name: FeatureSecurityDesc
data.value: Your data is protected with encryption and is not shared with third parties.

data.name: HowItWorksStep1Desc
data.value: Add your bank accounts, investments and other assets. No need to connect anything, just enter the names.

data.name: HowItWorksStep2Desc
data.value: Periodically create a snapshot by entering current balances. It only takes a few minutes per month.

data.name: HowItWorksStep3Desc
data.value: View trends, set goals and make informed decisions about your finances.

data.name: ReadyToStartDesc
data.value: Try the demo with sample data or request access for your family.

data.name: HelpSnapshot
data.value: A Snapshot is a "photograph" of your finances at a specific moment. Create snapshots regularly to track your wealth over time.

data.name: HelpAccounts
data.value: Accounts represent where you keep your money: checking accounts, savings accounts, brokers, etc. Set them up once and use them in snapshots.

data.name: HelpGoals
data.value: Goals help you save for specific milestones. Set a target amount, a deadline and the app will calculate how much you need to set aside each month.

data.name: HelpBudget
data.value: Budget allows you to categorize monthly expenses and compare them with the limits you've set.

data.name: HelpPortfolios
data.value: Portfolios group your investments. You can track stocks, ETFs, funds and calculate returns.

data.name: HelpProjections
data.value: Projections show where your wealth will be in the future, based on historical trends.

data.name: HelpCompare
data.value: Compare two snapshots to see what changed between one period and another.

data.name: HelpInvestments
data.value: Investments show all your financial assets: stocks, ETFs, funds. Track cost basis, current value and performance.

data.name: HelpInterests
data.value: Interests show accumulated returns on your savings accounts and fixed-rate instruments.

data.name: HelpPension
data.value: Pension & Insurance: pension funds, life insurance, retirement accounts. Track contributions and accrued value.

data.name: HelpDataManagement
data.value: Data Management: import and export your data in JSON or CSV format for backup or migration.

data.name: InsightWealthUpMsg
data.value: Your wealth increased by {0}% compared to last month. Great job!

data.name: InsightWealthDownMsg
data.value: Your wealth decreased by {0}% compared to last month.

data.name: InsightBudgetWarningMsg
data.value: You're at {1}% of "{0}" budget and it's only day {2}.

data.name: InsightBudgetHealthyMsg
data.value: You still have {0}% of your budget available this month!

data.name: InsightGoalDeadlineMsg
data.value: Goal "{0}" expires in less than a month. â‚¬{1} remaining.

data.name: InsightZeroInterestMsg
data.value: You have {0} savings accounts with 0% yield. Consider alternatives.

data.name: ImportWizardSubtitle
data.value: Upload your bank CSV and automatically categorize expenses.

data.name: UploadCsvDesc
data.value: We support standard formats from major banks (Revolut, Intesa, etc).

data.name: NoExpensesRecorded
data.value: No expenses recorded for this month

data.name: ImportHistoryDesc
data.value: View and manage past imports. You can undo entire batches if needed.

data.name: NoImportsDesc
data.value: You haven't imported any data yet.

data.name: SmartCatLearnedTooltip
data.value: Auto-categorized based on your previous choices

data.name: SmartCatBetaDesc
data.value: The system learns from your choices: the more you use it, the smarter it gets!
